method.name: IsInitialized
method.comment: Tests whether the object has been initialized.

method.name: _getoverscrollmode
method.comment: gets the OverScrollMode mode of the SvrollView OVER_SCROLL_ALWAYS = 0 OVER_SCROLL_IF_CONTENT_SCROLLS = 1 OVER_SCROLL_NEVER = 2

method.name: _getscrollbardefaultdelaybeforefade
method.comment: sets the ScrollBarDefaultDelayBeforeFade of the SvrollView in milliseconds DelayBeforeFade is the time before the ScrollBar disappears

method.name: _getscrollbarfadeduration
method.comment: gets the ScrollBarFadeDuration of the SvrollView in milliseconds ScrollBarFadeDuration is the fading duration (slowly disappearing)

method.name: _getscrollbarsize
method.comment: Gets the ScrollBar size in pixels unfortunately this seem not worfink, no effect on my devices

method.name: _getscrollbarstyle
method.comment: Gets the ScrollBar style SCROLLBARS_INSIDE_OVERLAY = 0 (0x00000000) SCROLLBARS_INSIDE_INSET = 16777216 (0x01000000) SCROLLBARS_OUTSIDE_INSET = 50331648 (0x03000000) SCROLLBARS_OUTSIDE_OVERLAY = 33554432 (0x02000000)

method.name: _getverticalfadingedgelength
method.comment: Gets the length, in pixels, of the fading edge (the shadows on top and bottom of the ScrollView

method.name: _getverticalscrollbarposition
method.comment: Gets the vertical Scrollbar position of the ScrollView SCROLLBAR_POSITION_DEFAULT = 0 position defined by the operating system SCROLLBAR_POSITION_LEFT = 1 SCROLLBAR_POSITION_RIGHT = 2

method.name: _initialize
method.comment: Initializes the object. You can add parameters to this method if needed.

method.name: _setoverscrollmode
method.comment: sets the OverScrollMode mode of the SvrollView OVER_SCROLL_ALWAYS = 0 OVER_SCROLL_IF_CONTENT_SCROLLS = 1 OVER_SCROLL_NEVER = 2

method.name: _setscrollbardefaultdelaybeforefade
method.comment: sets the ScrollBarDefaultDelayBeforeFade of the SvrollView in milliseconds DelayBeforeFade is the time before the ScrollBar disappears

method.name: _setscrollbarfadeduration
method.comment: sets the ScrollBarFadeDuration of the SvrollView in milliseconds ScrollBarFadeDuration is the fading duration (slowly disappearing)

method.name: _setscrollbarsize
method.comment: Sets the ScrollBar size in pixels unfortunately this seem not worfink, no effect on my devices

method.name: _setscrollbarstyle
method.comment: Sets the ScrollBar style SCROLLBARS_INSIDE_OVERLAY = 0 (0x00000000) SCROLLBARS_INSIDE_INSET = 16777216 (0x01000000) SCROLLBARS_OUTSIDE_INSET = 50331648 (0x03000000) SCROLLBARS_OUTSIDE_OVERLAY = 33554432 (0x02000000)

method.name: _setverticalfadingedgeenabled
method.comment: enables the VerticalFadingEdge of the SvrollView the VerticalFadingEdges are the 'shadows' on top and bottom of the ScrollView

method.name: _setverticalscrollbarenabled
method.comment: displays or hides the VerticalScrollBar of the ScrollView

method.name: _setverticalscrollbarposition
method.comment: Sets the vertical Scrollbar position of the ScrollView SCROLLBAR_POSITION_DEFAULT = 0 position defined by the operating system SCROLLBAR_POSITION_LEFT = 1 SCROLLBAR_POSITION_RIGHT = 2
